data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: No matter in study or work, teamwork, and cooperation with others cannot be avoided. Some strategies are required especially working with someone who is not compatible with us. The first and most important strategy is to put the team's goal at the highest priority, which indicates that we still need to show a great attitude to share ideas and willingness to cooperate rather than simply giving up. Only focusing on the fight between each other may cause everyone cannot finish the tasks. Sometimes, we need to think from others' perspectives to figure out whether their opinions are reasonable. It is likely that we have different plans and methods but all of them can achieve the same results. Moreover, when working together, trying to avoid direct conflicts is also a great strategy. Some issues can be discussed further when we calm down and if necessary, we can ask the superior for advice and guidance. (151字)
data.referenceText: Describe some strategies for working with someone with whom you are not compatible.
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一些用于与你不合适的人一起工作的策略。
